name: Critter Crib
description:
In Critter Crib, you play as a conservationist looking after a population of ball-like creatures, called Critters.

Your aim is to ensure the population reaches 70 individuals, by providing food and steering the Critters' instincts.

The Critters will slowly evolve and reproduce, largely out of your control. However, the more comfortable they get, the more likely they are to develop negative traits.
